gw.lang.reflect.module

Class IModule

  • gw.lang.reflect.module.IModule

  • public class IModule

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIG_RESOURCE_PREFIX
      static String CONFIG_RESOURCE_PREFIX_2
      List<Dependency> Dependencies
      A list of dependencies for this module. The list may contain both libraries and other modules. The dependency graph must not have cycles.
      IExecutionEnvironment ExecutionEnvironment
      IFileSystemGosuClassRepository FileRepository
      List<IDirectory> JavaClassPath
      ClassLoader ModuleClassLoader
      Get class loader, associated with this module.
      IModule[] ModuleTraversalList
      ITypeLoaderStack ModuleTypeLoader
      String Name
      A unique name relative to all other modules in a given execution environment.
      Object NativeModule
      The module/project from the execution environment that corresponds with this logical module. For example, in Eclipse the native module is of type IJavaProject.
      IDirectory OutputPath
      List<IDirectory> Roots
      List<IDirectory> SourcePath
      The path[s] having source files that should be exposed to this module.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDependency(Dependency Dependency)
      void configurePaths(List<IDirectory> classpath, List<IDirectory> sourcePaths)
      Configure both source and Java classpaths of the module in a semi-automated way. First parameter is Java classpath. Second parameter is extended with all paths from Java classpath that are marked to have Gosu "sources" (through MANIFEST.MF with Contains-Sources header) and used as Gosu source path.
      void disposeLoader()
      List<T> getTypeLoaders(Class<T> typeLoaderClass)
      Returns typeloaders of the given class that are local to this module as well as such typeloaders from dependent modules.
      String pathRelativeToRoot(IResource IResource)
      void removeDependency(Dependency Dependency)
      void setDependencies(List<Dependency> List<Dependency>)
      void setJavaClassPath(List<IDirectory> List<IDirectory>)
      void setName(String String)
      void setNativeModule(INativeModule INativeModule)
      void setRoots(List<IDirectory> List<IDirectory>)
      void setSourcePath(List<IDirectory> List<IDirectory>)

    • Field Detail

      • Dependencies

        List<Dependency> Dependencies
        A list of dependencies for this module. The list may contain both libraries and other modules. The dependency graph must not have cycles.

      • ExecutionEnvironment

        IExecutionEnvironment ExecutionEnvironment

      • FileRepository

        IFileSystemGosuClassRepository FileRepository

      • JavaClassPath

        List<IDirectory> JavaClassPath

      • ModuleClassLoader

        ClassLoader ModuleClassLoader
        Get class loader, associated with this module.

      • ModuleTraversalList

        IModule[] ModuleTraversalList

      • ModuleTypeLoader

        ITypeLoaderStack ModuleTypeLoader

      • Name

        String Name
        A unique name relative to all other modules in a given execution environment.

      • NativeModule

        Object NativeModule
        The module/project from the execution environment that corresponds with this logical module. For example, in Eclipse the native module is of type IJavaProject.

      • OutputPath

        IDirectory OutputPath

      • Roots

        List<IDirectory> Roots

      • SourcePath

        List<IDirectory> SourcePath
        The path[s] having source files that should be exposed to this module.

      • CONFIG_RESOURCE_PREFIX

        String CONFIG_RESOURCE_PREFIX

      • addDependency

        void addDependency(Dependency Dependency)
        Parameters:

      • configurePaths

        void configurePaths(List<IDirectory> classpath,
                  List<IDirectory> sourcePaths)
        Configure both source and Java classpaths of the module in a semi-automated way. First parameter is Java classpath. Second parameter is extended with all paths from Java classpath that are marked to have Gosu "sources" (through MANIFEST.MF with Contains-Sources header) and used as Gosu source path.
        Parameters:
        classpath -
        sourcePaths -
